item.name: Remap Left Control Key to F1 Key
item.appendix: This maps Left Control to F1 for use with HammerSpoon Hyper Key Bindings

item.name: F11 to F11
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F11, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::F11
